      `
    ];

    // Set the duration between frames (in milliseconds)
    const frameDuration = 500;

    // Function to display the frame
    const displayFrame = (frame) => {
      const frameElement = document.getElementById('frame');
      frameElement.textContent = frame;
    };

    // Function to animate the frames
    const animateFrames = () => {
      let currentFrame = 0;

      // Display the initial frame
      displayFrame(frames[currentFrame]);

      // Function to switch to the next frame
      const nextFrame = () => {
        currentFrame = (currentFrame + 1) % frames.length;
        displayFrame(frames[currentFrame]);
      };

      // Animate the frames
      setInterval(nextFrame, frameDuration);
    };

    // Start the animation
    animateFrames();
  </script>
</body>
</html>
